meta.title: Next.js English
meta.description: Production grade React applications that scale. The world's leading companies use Next.js by Vercel to build static and dynamic websites and web applications.

HomePage.title: The React Framework for the Web
HomePage.subtitle: Used by some of the world's largest companies, Next.js enables you to create high-quality web applications with the power of React components.
HomePage.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to build great products on the web.

features.title: Built-in Optimizations
features.desc: Automatic Image, Font, and Script Optimizations for improved UX and Core Web Vitals.

features.title: Data Fetching
features.desc: Make your React component async and await your data. Next.js supports both server and client data fetching.

features.title: Server Actions
features.desc: Run server code by calling a function. Skip the API. Then, easily revalidate cached data and update your UI in one network roundtrip.

features.title: Advanced Routing & Nested Layouts
features.desc: Create routes using the file system, including support for more advanced routing patterns and UI layouts.

features.title: Dynamic HTML Streaming
features.desc: Instantly stream UI from the server, integrated with the App Router and React Suspense.

features.title: CSS Support
features.desc: Style your application with your favorite tools, including support for CSS Modules, Tailwind CSS, and popular community libraries.

features.title: Route Handlers
features.desc: Build API endpoints to securely connect with third-party services for handling auth or listening for webhooks.

features.title: Middleware
features.desc: Take control of the incoming request. Use code to define routing and access rules for authentication, experimentation, and internationalization.

features.title: React Server Components
features.desc: Add components without sending additional client-side JavaScript. Built on the latest React features.

features.title: Client and Server Rendering
features.desc: Flexible rendering and caching options, including Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR), on a per-page level.

features.title: Next.js 15
features.desc: The power of full-stack to the frontend. Read the release notes.

LearnPage.title: Start building with Next.js
LearnPage.subtitle: Go from beginner to expert by learning the foundations of Next.js and building a fully functional demo website that uses all the latest features.
